Params: {3: 'False solace teetered on the brink of collapse. Before the body became ethereal, the pain came first.'}
{3: 'His knees are quickly becoming feeble. Having found a way out, the blood in his body pours toward his chest.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Yeah... back then, I wasn't ▅▃▆▅ yet. Only one thing could have happened when you were ambushed by a Corrupted of that size..."}
{3: 'As this thought went through his head, his hands, having gone numb, felt the weight and warmth of the young life...'}
{3: 'That he was holding tightly in his arms.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Right... at least I need to get him out...'}
{2: '??', 3: "Mr. Watanabe! Mr. Watanabe! Don't die, don't die!"}
{3: "A small hand pressed against the gaping wound in his chest but couldn't stop the wind from passing through."}
{2: '??', 3: "It's all my fault... You did it all... just for me... I'm sorry!"}
{3: 'This is my responsibility, a vow I made to myself.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'They would have done the same, no?'}
{3: 'It was then that Watanabe noticed five blurry shadows behind him, one with a severed arm.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Bruce... did you come to get me?'}
{3: "He could hear the child's cries as Death stood silently behind him."}
{3: 'The gaze of both the living and the dead focused on Watanabe, who was teetering on the edge of life and death.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Just let me finish this at least...'}
{3: 'He tried to lift his already cold legs, breaking out of his chaotic thoughts the moment his decision was made.'}
{3: 'Regaining consciousness from a brief daze, he saw the kid picking up stones and hurling them forcefully behind him.'}
{1: '1', 3: "They're not the souls of the dead—but a few broken Corrupted."}
{3: "Watanabe's lips moved, producing a faint sound, while the sound of blood rushing through his veins echoed in his ears."}
{3: 'Life gradually left him, returning to the black soil.'}
{3: "The child's anger was tinged with fear and trembling."}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the sound of metal dragging on the ground grew closer, the child went from trembling with anger to looking on with fear.'}
{3: "He dropped the stone and grabbed Watanabe's hand, trying to drag him away."}
{3: 'But how in the world was a starving child supposed to move an adult?'}
{3: "Watanabe's eyes closed before gunfire drowned that voice he couldn't be more familiar with."}
